enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc: Reduces damage from heavy impacts like melee attacks or collisions.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces damage from environmental dangers like fire, lightning, or harmful plants.
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Reduces damage from supremely destructive forces such as poison, wither skulls, or explosions.
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Reduces damage from projectiles such as arrows, fireballs, and falling blocks.
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Increases damage against creepy-crawly monsters like Spiders, Creepers, Slimes, and Guardians.
Increases damage against animals such as Hoglins and Polar Bears.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.sentine: Increases damage against humanoid monsters like Illagers, Piglins, and Endermen.
